content: designed by a lesbian mom i ve created this simple pride heart as a gift for those who need a mom hug using chenille yarn available at dollar tree it makes the perfect keychain or mini purse charm but it can really be done in any size yarn that you choose you can ignore the suggested color changes and make a solid heart any way that you want at around 2 wide it s a perfect size to add to a plushie for valentine s day you re welcome
